menu.name: Hard Mode
menu.desc: Add extra difficulty to mechanics. (FOR CHADS!)

checkbox.name: PS HARD MODE!!!
checkbox.desc: Start with only 2 PS instead of 4. All PS notes will be half transperency!

checkbox.name: SCREAMER HARD MODE!!!
checkbox.desc: Jump scares last 3x longer. All SCREAMER notes will be half transperency!

checkbox.name: BLUE NOTE HARD MODE!!!
checkbox.desc: Bigger early hit window. All BLUE notes will be half transperency!

checkbox.name: ORANGE NOTE HARD MODE!!!
checkbox.desc: Smaller hit windows. All ORANGE notes will be half transperency!

checkbox.name: Particle Effects
checkbox.desc: Enable/Disable Particles (ok i acuttaly get why you want to disbale this one its very intensive)

checkbox.name: Sprite Trails
checkbox.desc: Enable/Disable Trails On Sprites. (for even bigger toasters)

checkbox.name: Developer Mode
checkbox.desc: Enables debug_tools.hx, allows for speeding up/slowing down the game. PRESS 2 - Slows Game By 10% (Min Speed: 10%) PRESS 3 - Resets Game Speed To 100% PRESS 4 - Speeds Game By 10% (Max Speed: 200%) PRESS 5 - Hold To Speed Game By 2000%, Uses BOTPLAY PRESS 6 - Toggle For Botplay On Player Strums
